Posts.Content:
Well hello Sephie! And thanks for the tip about
 cancerforum, hadn't thought about
 that!
I have to admit I was / am floored by the lack of response I got here - guess we really are "lucky" on the PCa forum to have so much activity.
56 yrs old, excellent health - DX'd with PCa July '12
PSA 5.8 
Biopsy 6/27/12 
9 of 12 Gleason: 3+3 and 3+4 (All neg PNI)
Negative DRE’s / NO / MO / T1C / Gland size 40gm / Vol. 22gm
Volume Study 8/14/12 
Casodex 50mg daily 5 wks prior 2 wks post BT
LDR BT 9/21/12 – no issues
3 mo PSA 12/20 0.48!
6 mo PSA 3/14 0.21!
9 mo PSA 6/18/13 0.30!
Posts.Title: Breast cancer bone metastasis and anemia

9 of 12 Gleason: 3+3 <5%, 3+3 <5%, 3+3 <5%, 3+3 <5%, 3+4 5-10%, 3+4 <5%, 3+4 5-10%, 3+4 30-40%, 3+4 15-20% (All neg PNI)
Negative DRE’s / NO / MO / T1C / Gland size 40gm / Vol. 22gm

Casodex 50mg daily 5 wks prior 2 wks post BT

6 mo PSA 3/14 0.21!
Posts.Title: Angelina Jolie undergoes a preventive double mastectomy - hopes to inspire other women. . . .

Posts.Content:
Hi BAK - thanks for taking time to post here. . . I really don't understand the lack of postings in this "Breast Cancer" forum. . . 
Mom outwardly seems to be doing well, always cheerful, still doing her twice daily walks - but she's not eating much and is losing weight noticeably. . . . I just wonder if she's sharing everything with us.
Thanks so much again for your post - and my very best wishes to you in your own journey.
Godspeed to you.

Posts.Title: Breast cancer bone metastasis and anemia

Posts.Content:
Hi, looking for some help understanding what's going on with my Mom.  74 Y/O in phenomenal health, Dx'd with BCa in June 2012 at age 73; single mastectomy went very well, but 2 weeks later bone mets found in follow-up CT scan.  
55 yrs old, excellent health - DX'd with PCa July '12
